text: @JoeBiden But lives are worth losing everyday to the cost of illegal aliens and abortions? You must be consistent in your arguement/ message. Cant say this & be for open borders, abortion, & release of criminals from jail during COVID-19 scare. Lockdown costs lives by suicide daily
